stack.mobile_path: Capacitor (wrap React web) or native with shared API

commands.setup: npm install && cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
commands.dev: docker-compose up && (cd frontend && npm run dev) & (cd backend && uvicorn main:app --reload)
commands.test: cd backend && pytest && cd ../frontend && npm test
commands.lint: cd frontend && npm run lint && cd ../backend && pylint . && black --check .
commands.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && docker build -t pdf-editor:latest .

api_contract.versioning: semantic versioning (v1, v2, etc. in URL path)

nfr_summary.security: JWT authentication, HTTPS enforced, S3 server-side encryption, no PDF content in logs, GDPR compliance (30-day retention)
nfr_summary.performance: P95 response < 5s per PDF (< 50MB), support 100 concurrent users, async processing for large files
nfr_summary.privacy: User data isolation, soft deletes, audit logs, encrypted at rest, no data sharing
nfr_summary.offline: Planned for mobile phase with local caching and sync when online
